8 Points <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/product/L3V-00002_Microsoft_Sculpt_Comfort_Desktop_-_keyboard_and_mouse_set_-_Canadian_English.aspx?cmp=EBGRNOV18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>

Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply.
